H0.text: Who was the only female candidate in the 2010 Labour leadership contest. Harriet Harman

H1.text: Who was the only female candidate in the 2010 Labour leadership contest. Yvette Cooper

H2.text: Who was the only female candidate in the 2010 Labour leadership contest. Jacqui Smith

H3.text: Who was the only female candidate in the 2010 Labour leadership contest. Diane abbot

A4.text: Following Brown's resignation, she quickly announced that she would remain Deputy Leader rather than standing for election as Leader.
